DataElement.preferredDefinition: Flag indicating that the PK date (or start date) is the same as the previous specimen collection date (or start date).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pharmacokinetic Concentration Domain Collection Date Flag

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH PROMPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Same as Previous (Specimen/Sample Collection End) Date

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does not map to an SDTMIG variable. The SDTM Annotated CRF is annotated to indicate that this field is NOT SUBMITTED.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: When a series of specimen are taken on a single form, this field is tied to the collection date to allow for the flag to be used as a surrogate for the date field. Its selection means that the date of this specimen is the same as the date of the last specimen collected (in the series). This variable may be used when collecting PK data and the use re-entering of dates is more cumbersome than selecting the check box.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Check if the specimen/sample
ReferenceDocuments.description: Check if the specimen/sample was collected on the same date as the (last/previous specimen/sample) (collected/collection ended)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Select when the date of this specimen collection is the same as the date of the previous specimen collected. If left blank, "PCDAT" for this specimen must be populated. (or "PCPERF" must be flagged to indicate this sample was not collected).

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-11 ak Released per governance approval. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
